description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Heavy Payload 2 is an aerial shoot 'em up set over the European Theater of World War II. The game has two modes (Arcade and Advanced) with 18 missions and 4 difficulty settings.  Heavy Payload 2 has more enemies, faster machine guns, carpet bombing, a new map and other audio/visual enhancements.
